QuestData.Title: Note to the Mayor
QuestData.Description: Take this note to Ello Ebonlocke, the Mayor of Darkshire.$B$BHe and I are old friends...and when he reads it and discovers what you did for me...I'm sure he'll be just as happy as I am! Hahahaha!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Abercrombie's Letter to Ello Ebonlocke, Mayor of Darkshire.
QuestData.CompletionText: A letter? What's this all about?
QuestData.RewardText: <Ello looks at the letter, and immediately pales.>$B$BYou fool! You've doomed us all!
